messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] dawn's intro
messages.msgSnippet: ... expect me to answer with the name of the school and i respond with no, actually, we re contemplating homeschool, Hi Dawn. Couldn t you just tell them
messages.messageBody:
>>>every time people say to me, 'oh, is your son in preschool?' and clearly
expect me to answer with the name of the school and i respond with 'no,
actually, we're contemplating homeschool,>>>

Hi Dawn.

Couldn't you just tell them that you'd miss him too much to send him off so
young or something like that? He's only 3. You don't need to be
contemplating any concrete answers for at least another couple of years.
Why do people want people to send their babies off so soon and then look at
you like you're the one who's crazy for wanting them home!

I interviewed for a job the other day. I was telling the interviewer that I
was looking for part-time because I only had a few years left with my kids
but that because they were older I didn't have the time restrictions that
you have with little ones. She said, "Yea, I know what you mean. I'm
finally getting my life back now that my kids are getting older." Turns out
her kids are 3 and 5. I dropped that subject fast--lol!

Crystal
